pages.text: Lets get started creating our very first rocket. In order to begin, we first need to collect some items: $(li) Wooden Planks (any variant)$(li) Gunpowder $(li) Iron Ingot $(br2)Once you have collected all these items, we can get started creating our first rocket. The recipes are on the right hand side.
Once you have crafted all three of these items, arrange them as shown on the page to the right to create a very basic rocket!
